data.descriptor: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.caption: Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018
data.news_body: Pansari Developers Limited has informed the Exchange about Certificate under SEBI (Depositories and Participants) Regulations, 2018

data.caption: Trading Window
data.news_body: Pansari Developers Limited has informed the Exchange regarding the Trading Window closure pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015

data.caption: Reply to Clarification- Financial results
data.news_body: The Exchange had sought clarification from Pansari Developers Limited for the quarter ended 30-Sep-2025 with respect to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. On basis of above the Company was required to clarify the following:   -1. Consolidated Balance sheet statement not submitted -2. Consolidated Profit and Loss Statement not submitted -3. Consolidated Statement of Cash Flow not submitted The response of the Company is enclosed.

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: Pansari Developers Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'National Stock Exchange of India Limited ( NSE ) has levied an SOP fine of ₹1,47,500 (including GST) on the Company for the quarter ended 30 September 2025 under Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, in relation to non-inclusion of consolidated financial statements in the PDF submission.'.

data.caption: Clarification - Financial Results
data.news_body: The Exchange has sought clarification from Pansari Developers Limited for the quarter ended 30-Sep-2025 with respect to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. On basis of above the Company is required to clarify the following:  -1. Consolidated Balance sheet statement not submitted -2. Consolidated Profit and Loss Statement not submitted -3. Consolidated Statement of Cash Flow not submitted The response of the Company is awaited.

data.caption: Updates
data.news_body: Pansari Developers Limited has informed the Exchange regarding 'Revised PDF of outcome of board meeting containing both standalone and consolidated financial statement'.

data.caption: Copy of Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Pansari Developers Limited has informed the Exchange about Copy of Newspaper Publication

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Pansari Developers Limited has submitted to the Exchange, the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025.

data.caption: Outcome of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Pansari Developers Limited has submitted to the Exchange, the financial results for the period ended September 30, 2025.
